Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe dabere na Tema, Greater Accra
E hiwere ya na Febụwarị 24, 1978 ma gbanwee ya ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgwọ ọha na eze na Mee 28, 1996
Mgbe enyechara ọhaneze izizi  na onwa Ọktoba 1996, e depụtara ya na Ghana Stock Exchange na Nọvemba 29, 1996 na ọnụ ahịa oke nke GH¢ 0.135. Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ndepụta akụrụngwa nke GSE All-Share Index.
Aluworks bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta akwa aluminom, eriri igwe, mkpuchi ụlọ, akwa akwa, wdg sitere na ingots aluminom raw.
Ofu niime ndị isi na-ere ihe ndị Aluworks, ụlọ ọrụ Volta Aluminium, emechiri kpamkpam n'etiti Mee 2003 na mmalite 2006 n'ihi nsogbu dị na mkparịta ụka ọkụ eletrik.
